attributes.description:

In addition to a 4 year/60 000 km service plan, WR-V 1.2 Elegance is covered by a 5 year/200 000 km factory warranty and AA roadside assistance for 3 years. Finance is available, and trade-ins are welcome. The WR-V also boasts an abundance of safety, convenience and connectivity features across the two model range, making an exceptionally comfortable driving experience.

attributes.description: All our cars come standard with a 6 year 150 000km Warranty. Contact us for further information or to book a test drive. Nash Nissan is committed to bringing you quality New, PreOwned and Demo vehicles. Our vehicles are quality checked and undergo the roadworthiness test prior to delivery of the vehicle. All tradeins are welcome, we pay fair market related prices. Finance is available through all major finance providers and our team will tailor the deal to suit your needs. Nash Nissan is a division of Super Group whereby we are committed to earning your trust and building relationships.
